seeds.name: Cauliflower Seeds
seeds.description: Valuable, but slow-growing. Despite its pale color, the florets are packed with nutrients.

seeds.name: Parsnip Seeds
seeds.description: A spring tuber closely related to the carrot. It has an earthy taste and is full of nutrients.

seeds.name: Potato Seeds
seeds.description: Plant these in the spring. Takes 6 days to mature, and has a chance of yielding multiple potatoes at harvest.

seeds.name: Carrot Seeds
seeds.description: Plant these in the spring. Takes 6 days to mature, and has a chance of yielding multiple carrots at harvest.

seeds.name: Pepper Seeds
seeds.description: Plant these in the summer. Takes 5 days to mature, and continues to produce after first harvest.

tools.name: Improved Hoe
tools.description: Better than your starter hoe, definitely better than the hoe on the corner.

tools.name: Improved Watering Can
tools.description: Holds more water than the staring can, but not as much as the whale you saw at the pool

iotd.name: Cool AF Item
iotd.description: Bad ass mo-fo item, yah yeet.
